content:
Hi, I would appreciate it if someone has a look at this PR (+68, -50). This is partly a cleanup and factors out a general construction for continuous linear maps on Schwartz space, so it makes it possible to construct lots of operators on S\mathcal{S}S. It should be fairly easy to review.
As a side note, I have never seen such a lemma in the literature, most people just prove well-posedness and say 'for the continuity the same argument applies'.
